meta.title: Diwali 2025 | College Events
meta.description: Celebrate the festival of lights with rangoli competitions, puja, and a grand illumination on October 21, 2025.

about.title: About The Festival of Lights
description: Join us for a spectacular Diwali celebration across the campus. Known as the Festival of Lights, Diwali signifies the victory of good over evil. Our campus will be adorned with thousands of diyas and beautiful rangoli.

The evening's festivities will include a Rangoli and Diya decoration competition, followed by a traditional Lakshmi Puja in the hostels. The night will conclude with a grand and safe fireworks display in the main grounds, illuminating the sky.

highlights.title: Last Year's Illumination
highlights.caption: A look back at the dazzling campus lights from Diwali 2024.

categories.title: Art Competitions
categories.description: Showcase your creativity in Rangoli and Diya art.

categories.title: Lakshmi Puja
categories.description: Participate in the traditional evening prayer.

categories.title: Fireworks Display
categories.description: Enjoy a safe and spectacular show.

articles.title: Celebrate a Bright Diwali on Campus
articles.excerpt: Join competitions, puja, and a safe fireworks display.

questions.question: Are outside fireworks allowed?
questions.answer: No, for safety reasons, only fireworks provided and handled by the college at the designated area are permitted.
